releaseNotes.title: Version 1.3 - Real-Time Live Stream Updates
changes: Added Twitch EventSub webhooks for real-time live stream notifications

releaseNotes.title: Version 1.2 - Calendar Layout Update
changes: Changed calendar week start from Sunday to Monday

releaseNotes.title: Version 1.1 - Enhanced User Experience
changes: Added version tracking and release notes system
Added clickable version display with release notes modal
Added Redis integration to persist ideas
Optimized CI pipeline for faster builds and better reliability
